name: Laws of Physics: GRAVITY
description:
Laws of Physics is a Complex Puzzle game made for the GMTK jam 2021 where you control gravity, literally.

PLEASE CENTER YOUR MOUSE ON THE SCREEN IF YOU ARE USING THE WEBGL, I WAS DUMB AND USED THE ONCLICK() METHOD FOR PICKING UP BOXES.

I ALSO FORGOT TO DISABLE A THING AND NOW TIME IS UP :( WHATEVER I HOPE IT'S STILL GOOD :) SO JUST REMEMBER IN THE FIRST PUZZLE WITH A BUTTON, THE BUTTON ENABLES THE EXIT DOOR, SO DO NOT GO THROUGH THE EXIT PORTAl WITHOUT THE BUTTON BEING ENABLED. THE REST OF THE GAME IS NORMAL.

I really love this idea, I will probably make this a full release.

IF you get stuck at the non-euclidean maze at the start, go left at the first intersection, you'll get to the exit of the maze.
